title: Over it!
body: Every god damn game i play ill call my lane that i wanna play and there are always people their starting shit about it, i called mid 5 times in 5 games and i got abused and treated like shit and i didn't get the lane. the behavior in league is horrible, anyone else feel the same??  sick of all the people that crack the shits with you and abuse you if you die.. or screw up.. and when you call your lane first before anyone else and then some one else calls it 2nd and then it starts a massive war over it..

replies.body:
Make friends and only play with pre-made groups.

Makes the league experience a billion times better.

The worst thing is they just instalock Urgot, Ashe, Ezreal or Teemo. And they start feeding in the game. 

The best thing to do is either dodge or troll hard like they do. Raging will get you no where, instead take risks on troll games and try something new. Like Tank Teemo, ad carry nami, ap yi etc.

A. Stop playing bot games, you will learn nothing from versing them.

and B. It's normal's, it will happen no matter what and it may suck but you gotta just deal with it, do ranked and say "mid please" you will more often than not get your role.
its all i can play becasue i have no friends or anyone to play with.. i try PvP but i allways loose..
